Buttons
  • Capture: take 1 picture
  • Auto: automatically take pictures every x seconds (set in setting)
  • Face: automatically take pictures on detecting face(s)
  • Black: set screen to black (touch to capture unless auto/face/video is running)
  • Video: start video recording (Android 2.3 or higher)
  • Volume Up: start auto mode (can be changed in setting)
  • Volume Down: take 1 picture (can be changed in setting)
  • Minimize: minimize the application but the image capture/video recording still running. Stop it by clicking the notification status
Tips
  • Disable background service feature to improve performance (setting - more)
  • You can stop background capture by clicking notification status or re-run the application
  • The image capture rotation is not correct? Go to image setting and change to correct it
  • Use Auto then Black to prevent anyone notice the application
  • You can zoom with pinch-to-zoom the preview image (Depends device support)
  • Use highest camera resolution with changing it in setting
  • You can enable autofocus to prevent blur images
  • You can disable autofocus in setting to increase capture speed
  • In setting - more.. there more advanced settings
  • You can set to start with black mode directly
  • If you have trouble taking picture try to changing the resolution in setting
  • If you have trouble on video recording try to changing the quality in setting
2 types image capture resolution
  • Low-res: faster, no shutter sound, lower camera resolution, more memory needed
  • High-res: slower, possible shutter sound(try to mute your phone), maximum camera resolution
High-res might still trigger shutter sound on some devices.
Rotating image will required a lot of memory, depends on image resolution
